moves.1. Nf3 Nf6 2. Nd4 Ng8 3. Nc6 Nf6 4. Nxb8: As you see Kirill (chessbrok) is giving a horse forward to me.
moves.6... e5: ..but not letting to put it to initial state.. my horse start jumping
moves.7. Nf3 e4 8. Nd4: don't want to go home g1
moves.8... c5: Also thinking it will be only bad to him that he moves pawns forward playing without knight
moves.9. Nf5 d5 10. Ng3 Bd6: he allows me to breath now ;)
moves.11. d3: "program movement" - triing to detonate his brave pawns
moves.11... exd3 12. cxd3: changed flank pawn to center one - count good
moves.12... O-O 13. Bg5: strong move - any exchange works for me, and this move forces exchange anyways
moves.13... Be5 14. e4 Bxb2: really mislooked it :( but finally it was np
moves.15. Nd2 Bxa1 16. Qxa1 dxe4 17. Ngxe4:
I'm on equal material, but having 2 minor pieces for his rook.
Also strong position as I count
moves.19. Bxf6: I'm ok just to make his pawn structure worse
moves.19... gxf6 20. Nxc5 Re8 21. Nce4: going to make castling so need to get bishop safer
moves.22. O-O Kg6 23. Rc1 f5 24. Ng3 f4 25. Ng: preparing b4 and my horse must stop defending bishop
moves.28. Kf1: horse is free to go now
moves.28... b4 29. a3: going to change 2 knights for a rook
moves.31... Qe7 32. Qxd2: got 1 more pawn at the moment, in general think my position is much better
moves.32... Qxa3 33. Qd1: I mean to give a check to h5
moves.34. d4: not sure strongest... but I should give my bishop go (really not good to keep queen in line with opponent's rook )
moves.35... Qc5 36. Rb5: finally my rook leaving to keep moveless his rook and bishop
moves.36... Qc7:
if I lucky to change queens it'd me much easier

he don't allow further pawn's movement
moves.37. Qd4 Ba6: he forces exchange.. not good to me
moves.38. Rc5 Bxe2+ 39. Kxe2 Qb7: now I'll make tricky combination that gives me a pawn and rook exchange
moves.40. Rc6+ Kh5 41. Rh6+ Kxh6 42. Qf6+ Kh5: nice how you think ? but now his checks starting
moves.45... Qb2+ 46. Kf3 Qc3+ 47. Kxf4 Qd4+ 48:
I'm running ok here I'm not sure more.. 

he repated it is a draw it is a draw, I kept on playing
moves.51. d6 Qf5+ 52. Ke7: I thought I will get save position on queen's side (left) ...
moves.52... Qe5+ 53. Kd7 Qb5+:
now I got that there is no safe place and started to count is there a place on another side.. now I think there is no such place and this is a draw.

But at the moment black resigned - not stand up to my certainty..

Impressive game to me!
